item.title: Version 1.7.3
item.description:
Bug fixes

  • Revive: Fixed stuttering in Raccoon Lagoon, Vader Immortal and Defector
    • Defector still has a latency issue, will be fixed in 1.8.0 soon
  • Revive: Fixed crash when launching Dance Central
  • ReviveXR: Fixed non-functional "enable OpenXR support" tray icon option
